outputSpeech.ssml: <speak>tomorrow for breakfast you will have oatmeal with brown sugar and milk, for lunch you will have half of a grilled ham and cheese sandwich, and for dinner you will have half a grilled cheese sandwich, tomato soup, grapes, crackers, and a peanut butter cookie</speak>

card.title: Meal Mate
card.content: tomorrow for breakfast you will have oatmeal with brown sugar and milk, for lunch you will have half of a grilled ham and cheese sandwich, and for dinner you will have half a grilled cheese sandwich, tomato soup, grapes, crackers, and a peanut butter cookie
